casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Maurice MCKINNON 304P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Maurice McKinnon, for McKinnon, Maurice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
